Raleigh.Wake County Speedway: Wake County Speedway "America's Favorite Bullring" is a quarter-mile asphalt race track located in Raleigh, NC. The track holds stock car races on alternating Friday nights from April to September. It has six main classes of cars which include late models, chargers, legends, mini stocks, U-cars, bandoleros, and bombers. The track also has special appearances from USAC and southern ground pounders.
